misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The use of "AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding" is a vulnerable algorithm as it uses a static IV, which can be easily predicted by an attacker.
recommendation: Use a secure algorithm, such as "AES/GCM/NoPadding" or "AES/CCM/NoPadding" instead.
